content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. It is always essential to consider the potential consequences and ethical implications associated with altering one's reality. Any decisions made in this regard should be well-informed, and individuals should seek professional guidance and support to ensure their actions are safe, legal, and ethical. Doing so helps to promote personal accountability, respect for others, and social justice, all of which are essential for building a more equitable and inclusive society.
